original: 刺探12個月指定據點的情報，以便攻打或招募武將。如果目標據點有受到打草驚蛇這項計略的影響，會導致知己知彼成功率大幅度下降。
text: Spying on the intelligence of designated strongholds for 12 months in order to attack or recruit generals. If the target stronghold is affected by the strategy of fighting grass and scaring snakes, the success rate of knowing yourself and the enemy will drop drastically.
